text: The history behind Jack Smith's Trump-Supreme Court gambit  —  A key 2020 episode — also involving the Supreme Court and a Trump claim of absolute immunity — is worth recalling in this moment  —  The question of Donald Trump's criminal jeopardy could be headed to the Supreme Court sooner rather than later.

Inflation slowed to a 3.1% annual rate in November  — The consumer price index, a closely watched inflation gauge, increased 0.1% in November, and was up 3.1% from a year ago.  — Excluding volatile food and energy prices, the core CPI increased 0.3% on the month and 4% from a year ago.
